ModMetaData.name: CaveBiome (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Rikiki
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of Rikikis mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=837412700
- Added the map-gens to DeepRim and Z-Levels so some of the features should be visible there. - French translation added, thanks qux! - Things should no longer short-circuit in the rain unless built in a cave-well
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/CaveBiome][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/XLUGyo4.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/6KqTKks.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img]
This mod adds a new biome: cave. This will allow you to explore and settle into the deep tunnels of this Rimworld. WARNING! Caveworld Flora must be enabled BEFORE this mod! See the forum thread for content/changelog and related mods. https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=13172.msg133449#msg133449
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
